data.name: ConnectionDescription
data.value: Managed connection manager
data.comment: For localizers and UE (These comments will be seen in LocStudio)

data.name: ComponentName
data.value: TVPMerge Destination

data.name: ComponentDisplayName
data.value: TVPMerge Destination

data.name: ComponentDescription
data.value: Performs an SQL MERGE operation using the buffer data as source, and the destination table as target.

data.name: ReadTimeoutDescription
data.value: Specifies the number of milliseconds before the component times out.

data.name: InputName
data.value: Merge Destination Input

data.name: ContactInfo1
data.value: ;Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SqlServer v10;

data.name: ContactInfo2
data.value: 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved; http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support;

data.name: TypeAssemblyInfo
data.value: Type and Assembly information: '{0}'.

data.name: DiagnosticPre
data.value: ExternalRequest_pre: The object is ready to make the following external request: '{0}'.

data.name: DiagnosticPost
data.value: ExternalRequest_post: '{0}'. The external request has completed."

data.name: ErrorOutputName
data.value: Merge Destination Error Output

data.name: TableName
data.value: Table or view

data.name: TableNameDescription
data.value: The destination database table name.

data.name: BatchSizeDescription
data.value: Specify the number of rows per batch. The default is 0 which uses the same size as SSIS internal buffer.

data.name: CommandTimeoutDescription
data.value: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates infinite time-out.

data.name: FailureToLoadSchema
data.value: The descriptor files on path {0} does not contain schema information for connection of type {1}.
data.comment: failure messages used for diagnostic purposes. Parameters: 0 - path (string), 1 - connection (string)

data.name: ConnectionReturnedNullSchema
data.value: No column information is found for table {1} by querying {0}.

data.name: ColumnnameDescriptorInvalid
data.value: ColumnName descriptor in the descriptor file on path {0} is invalid. The schema table does not contain a column with the name {1}.

data.name: DatatypeDescriptorInvalid
data.value: DataType descriptor in the descriptor file on path {0} is invalid. The schema table does not contain a column with the name {1}.

data.name: ColunsizeDescriptorInvalid
data.value: MaximumLength descriptor in the descriptor file on path {0} is invalid. The schema table does not contain a column with the name {1}.

data.name: NumericPrecisionDescriptorInvalid
data.value: NumericPrecision descriptor in the descriptor file on path {0} is invalid. The schema table does not contain a column with the name {1}.

data.name: NumericaScaleInvalid
data.value: NumericScale descriptor in the descriptor file on path {0} is invalid. The schema table does not contain a column with the name {1}.

data.name: FailureConvertTable
data.value: Failed to convert the schema table obtained by querying the connection to a standard format.

data.name: FailureGetMetadataTableByConnection
data.value: Failed to retrieve column properties by querying the connection. The problem is {0}.

data.name: FailureGetMetadataTableByCommand
data.value: Failed to retrieve column properties by executing SELECT statement with schema only option from the database. The problem is {0}. However, this does not mean everything has failed. The next attempt is to try to get schema table by querying connection.

data.name: SelectReturnEmptyTable
data.value: The provider returned an empty schema table.

data.name: UnableToLoadProviderInfos_DirectoryDoesntExist
data.value: Could not load provider specific information because the specified directory "{0}" does not exist.

data.name: UnableToLoadProviderInfos_FileMissing
data.value: Could not load provider specific information because the following file is not available: {0}.

data.name: UnableToLoadProviderInfos_UnableToDeserializeFile
data.value: Could not load the file with provider descriptors: {0}.

data.name: UnableToLoadMappingFile_UnableToCreateSerializer
data.value: Could not create XML serializer for type "{0}": {1}
data.comment: failure to load mapping file. Parameters: 0 - type (string), 1 - message (string)

data.name: UnableToLoadMappingFile_UnableToCreateFileStreamForOpen
data.value: Could not initialize file reader for reading the file: {0}

data.name: UnableToLoadMappingFile_UnableToCreateValidatingReader
data.value: Could not initialize an XML validating file reader: {0}

data.name: UnableToLoadMappingFile_UnableToReadSchema
data.value: Could not read XML schema to verify file correctness: {0}

data.name: UnableToLoadMappingFile_UnableToDeserializeFile
data.value: Could not load mapping file: {0}
